meanings.definition: Projecting horizontally and supported at only one end.
meanings.sent1: The cantilevered shelf in the kitchen looks modern and sleek.
meanings.sent2: The cantilevered balcony provided a stunning view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: I tried to balance a cantilevered book on my head for fun, but it kept falling off.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was cantilevered on the edge of a cliff, ready to plunge into uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The cantilevered design of the bridge made it stand out from the rest, like a daring acrobat in a sea of ordinary structures.

meanings.definition: Constructed with a projecting beam or structure.
meanings.sent1: The cantilevered roof of the house provided shade on hot summer days.
meanings.sent2: The cantilevered walkway extended over the river, offering a unique experience.
meanings.sent3: The cantilevered chair looked like it was defying gravity, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were cantilevered on the support of his hard work and determination.
meanings.sent5: The cantilevered sculpture in the park seemed to reach out to the sky, a testament to human creativity and ingenuity.
